metadata.title: CVE-2021-4011 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in xorg-x11-server in versions before 21.1.2 and before1.20.14. An out-of-bounds access can occur in the SwapCreateRegisterfunction. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to dataconfidentiality and integrity as well as system availability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-4011` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

xdmx - 2:1.20.13-1ubuntu2
xdmx-tools - 2:1.20.13-1ubuntu2
xnest - 2:1.20.13-1ubuntu2
xorg-server-source - 2:1.20.13-1ubuntu2
xserver-common - 2:1.20.13-1ubuntu2
xserver-xephyr - 2:1.20.13-1ubuntu2
xserver-xorg-core - 2:1.20.13-1ubuntu2
xserver-xorg-legacy - 2:1.20.13-1ubuntu2
xvfb - 2:1.20.13-1ubuntu2
No subscription required

xwayland - 2:21.1.3-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xorg-server package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.20.13-1ubuntu2').
xwayland package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:21.1.3-1ubuntu1').
